column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We had a reservation and were seated promptly in the back room (where I worried that we may be neglected)
column2: but it was no problem. Our waiter and the bus boys were very attentive
column3: and the pace was good. The only thing we had to ask for constantly was water
column4: because the glasses were so small and a few people in our party were only having water. For larger parties where this is the case
column5: leaving a pitcher of water on the table would be best. (Or at least larger glasses!)
